LanguageData.NoHeartForRevenantLostResurrectionSTNL: {0}'s heart was missing when {1} died, no resurrection will happen.
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_NoMoreBloodInTarget: {0} doesn't have any more blood to drain.
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_DrainAttackNoGenesSTNL: {0} doesn't have a gene to copy.
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_DrainAttackNoSkillSTNL: {0} doesn't have a skill to drain.
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_DrainAttackNoAbilitiesToCopySTN: {0} either doesn't have any abilities or {1} already has the same skills as {0}.
LanguageData.VPE_VestigeAppearedFromDeath_STNL: {0} has died, a vestige containing {1} memories has appeared where {2} died.
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_ResurrectionDelaySetting_STNL: Amount of time that it will take for Revenants/Losts to resurrect (in ticks).\n2500 = 1 hour / 60 000 = 1 day / 900 000 = 1 quadrum / 3 600 000 = 1 year
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_DrainAttack_SkillDrain_GainDivi: Divides the value of drained skills by this amount prior to gaining it (1 = full value): {0}
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_DrainingSkillRemovesGeneSetting: Should draining a target remove skill boosting genes?
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_SkillPointsLostOnDeath_STNL: Amount of skill points lost on death: {0}
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_VestigeSkillPointsGain_STNL: Amount of skill points gained in every skill upon using a vestige: {0}
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_VestigePsylinkLevelIncrease_STN: Using a vestige will increase the psylink level of the user by this amount: {0}
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_DeathSetting_AllowNonPlayerResu: Should non player creatures be able to respawn?
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_DeathSetting_AllowWildLostResur: Should wild Losts be able to respawn?
LanguageData.VPE_Vein_MistleMiasmaSetting_ShouldItIgn: Should the miasma emanated by Losts be able to pass through walls without vents? (includes Mistle protection radius)
